website_summaries.verdict: A durable tent that gives you a lot of options when it comes to arranging the interior.
pros: Holds up well in all kinds of weather
2 doors give you more options in how to arrange the inside of the tent
cons: Fiberglass tent rods are on the weak side
Some buyers claim this tent does poorly when the wind kicks up

customer_reviews.title: Not a high end tent, but good design and quiality for the money, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with this tent, especially with the price. Rained on us all weekend on our first trip out with it and it kept us dry. Zippers worked just fine. It assembled pretty easily with one person. Watch out for the 2 different length poles, there are three, maybe put a mark on the one shorter one. Really spacious inside, it slept three of us and two dogs just fine. I could see getting quite a few years out of it if I take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tent, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Recently took this tent on a trip where I towed my motorcycle. I wanted a tent where I could get dressed standing and without rolling around trying to get into my motorcycle gear. Stayed dry during several hard rains and was very comfortable. I put it up by myself in about 10-15 minutes. It is too large to pack on a motorcycle but I didn't buy it for small size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: We loved it! Super easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from Tahoe after 3 days in this tent. We loved it! Super easy to setup. Came with everything including a tiny loft, which is really handy, if just for setting up inside in the dark to hold a flashlight. I like that the included bag is not so small that it is impossible to put the tent back in while dis-assembling. That has always ticked me off. It's airy and yet has the perfect cover so it's private. Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hammernmt

customer_reviews.title: Tent is great! However
customer_reviews.text: Tent is great! However, fiberglass rods are weak and mine cracked on day 1!! Product apparently is discontinued and I am jumping through hoops to get a replacement pole! Nothing yet in 3 months...
customer_reviews.author: Spruceman

customer_reviews.title: My family loved it. It withheld nicely during Hurricane Harvey
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and durable. My family loved it. It withheld nicely during Hurricane Harvey.
customer_reviews.author: 7TWENTYONE

customer_reviews.title: Great tent - a little complicated
customer_reviews.text: This tent handled a rain storm pretty well. It has a welcome amount of space and headroom. It is a little confusing to put up but not as bad as tents 20+ years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Inkwan

customer_reviews.title: Front of tent pole too long and causes door zipper to malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Used once. Door zipper cover easily gets caught in the zipper and within that one weekend of use, the zipper tore up the zipper cover and came off the track. It's a really expensive tarp now. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawners

customer_reviews.title: Pole broke/splintered on the 4th trip
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tent to use on Cub Scout campouts twice a year. This was our fourth use. Light winds and a segment of the pole splintered and ripped the fly. Not impressed! I would like a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent! Not good for windy areas however. Since this is a star gazing tent most of the top is covered and when the wind came it was flapping loudly. Not a manufacturer problem just something to know.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Very dry tent..its worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Have put it up in May. Put some seam sealer on it hasn't leaked even in severe storms. It's worth the price. You can't make a mistake when buying this tent.
customer_reviews.author: dvance

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet so can't give a thorough review at this time. However, we were able to put it up with minimal effort and are very pleased with the overall appearance. This was just a test run to see how easily it assembles. However, when I can add more in depth info. I'll write an addendum to this review. Meanwhile, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: elaine steinle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and take down
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and take down. Used it for a few nights so far without any problems. So far I haven't used it in the rain yet, so I cannot attest to its performance in the rain. Update: I have used it many times now and have had no issues at all. To be fair I also got a can of seam sealer and sealed it before using it the first time. I have not had to reapply and have used it in 3 seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G.

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof tent
customer_reviews.text: Got this tent because my old tent had sprung a few leaks and I got to test this tent in the rain for 4 days. It held up excellently and I loved the abundance of space. Being able to stand up all the way made the experience of this tent that much better. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Good tent, design makes it very useful and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Good tent, design makes it very useful and roomy, rain fly is money and blocks wind really well. Fit a queen bed and pack and play and still had tons of room left over for gear.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I set it up with my 9 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I set it up with my 9 year old son no problem
customer_reviews.author: WA mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality at great price
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my granddaughter as her old tent met with a storm and self destructed. This one is going to make a twenty five year old ecstatic on Christmas! You can't go wrong with this tent. Quality materials, easy set up and delivery time spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Honey48

customer_reviews.title: Tent poles broke first time we used it. Rain ...
customer_reviews.text: Tent poles broke first time we used it. Rain fly undersized. We sent it back and got one from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Good family tent.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy but took longer to set up the first time than we expected. The tent did not 'steam' up and has good ventilation, space, and is lightweight but sturdy. We had two adults, three dogs and lots of gear with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby!
customer_reviews.text: Great spacious tent, pretty easy setup. One issue I had was that the flap over the zipper gets snagged pretty consistently. Can be easily avoided but if you quickly open or close zipper from outside without paying attention, the flap gets snagged. All in all though, pretty darn great tent!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a low price
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this tent. I haven't quite mastered setting it up by myself yet. I was able to set it up with my 4 foot tall son holding up the middle though. I am able to take it down by myself. It poured rain one day and the tent did not leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sundafyllir

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time. String in the pole broke. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Subaru Outback

customer_reviews.title: I love how big it is
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent during a few rainstorms and it remained totally dry. I love how big it is! I would definitely recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarpuff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used this tent at a bike rally and loved it. It stormed pretty hard and we were dry as a bone inside. I would recommend this tent for late spring to early fall use only due to the fact that the top is mesh without the fly and allows easy air exchange. easy set up, lots of room. will fit 2 queen air mattresses with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: Randall  White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thus tent is easy to put up, big and roomy. Durable material, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Huge but plastic feet
customer_reviews.text: Large tent with lots of ventilation, my only complaint is that the boots your pole goes into are made of cheep plastic. While setting up one of my rod boots broke while I was staking it to the ground. Other than that very tall tent, waterproofing was excellent, also would be good for bad weather conditions due to the "extra" tie downs on the waterproofing topper. Absolutely love the tent just wish the feet or "boots" would have been made of a better quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan made

customer_reviews.title: great buy! this tent is easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: great buy! this tent is easy to set up and has plenty of headroom, plenty of ventilation. delivery was a week earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Audra Neunkirchner

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, durable
customer_reviews.text: Kept water out during week of heavy rain storms in mountains. Quality tent, roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Easton

customer_reviews.title: Not for windy conditions
customer_reviews.text: This tent would be okay for fair weather conditions. We had gusty winds the first night and poles and the plastic feet they and the stakes go into broke. Also one seam ripped as we were setting the tent up, and one of the door zippers broke during the week we were using it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tent and pretty easy to assemble. I used it once so far and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to put up I thought we were missing something
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to put up I thought we were missing something. There is literally only 3 poles. The inside is spacious but, if you put a queen mattress inside you can't really stand up in it and it takes most of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Dorris

customer_reviews.title: Great tent but not good for windy conditions....
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome! The screen top is great at night. You will have a unobstructed view of the stars while sleeping. Easy to construct but lacks rigidity. With a 10-20 mph wind blowing, the tent sides collapse in on themselves which was really annoying. This is my second tent from this manufacturer and I was really let down by this. It seems to me that the tent poles need to be more stiff. Just my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Big Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The parts could be labeled better, but it's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice, here is what I know so far: -One time it rained all night and the tent held up very well, no leaking. -There are just two of us sleeping on a double layered queen air mattress. There is plenty of room for the mattress and any required luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted for our deck for the summer nights and enjoy the universe
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted for our deck for the summer nights and enjoy the universe!
customer_reviews.author: Sharrie Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: / I looked like the area where it was sewed was a defect ...
customer_reviews.text: The very first night the zipper got stuck and i had to cut it away from the rest of the tent./ I looked like the area where it was sewed was a defect in the placement of the extra material.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly LAbbe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Tent
customer_reviews.text: Took this tent camping once so far. It is very easy to setup. It doesn't hold up very well to winds over 15mph. The tent started to fold in on us. It's not that big of a deal and will remember to anchor it better next time. It comfortably would fit 4 adults and all their gear. Fitting 6 full sized adults in there would be very cramped and that doesn't include gear. It fit a single air matress and a queen sized air matress side by side with room on the sides. Wenzel makes great camping products and would recommend this tent to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Super Awesome Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent for a beginner. I have never built a tent, but I have about a half of a brain. I figured it out and had this thing up in about a half hour. Very simple just three poles. It is a much bigger tent than I anticipated but that's great for 2 and 4 year old, in order for them to run about in it. Great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sehstedt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent easy to set up and plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: PPP
customer_reviews.text: i am using it for a long time. it is very good for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Emrary

customer_reviews.title: This tent was awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Went Camping with our 2 older boys and we needed a tent that would be large enough for 2 queen sized air beds with room to move around. This tent was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this tent is great. No condensation build
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this tent is great. No condensation build, no leaks, easy set up and take down, and great ventilation as well. Can sleep six, but fits 4-5 with room, tall ceiling to where I'm sure anybody could stand up straight at it's center. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up, plenty of room to stand and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri K

customer_reviews.title: This tent is nice and big
customer_reviews.text: This tent is nice and big. The only down side is that the doors don't zip from down to up.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tent/spacious/not for lightweight camping but perfect for family camping.
customer_reviews.author: alicia w.

customer_reviews.title: This tent is awesome. My husband and I took it on a ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome. My husband and I took it on a casual camping trip and the two of us and all our stuff fit inside with wiggle room. We brought two sharper image foam trifold mats which when folded out are about the size of a queen mattress, and there was plenty of room left to walk around. We sprayed tent sealant on it before going but havent been out in the rain with it yet. And the wind wasn't high. But it seems well-made. Love this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: and all the extras easily went back in the bag
customer_reviews.text: So I promised myself I would write a review on this tent if 1 thing happened... if the tent would fit back in the bag. To my amazement it did. With 1 other person and the instructions the tent, and all the extras easily went back in the bag. Besides that fact it seemed very well put together, easy to put up, and kept us warm. Not much else to say. It will fit 2 queen size air mattresses, but not to much room for equipment after that. 2 fulls seems like a better fit with room for coolers, and other assorted gear. I am still amazed it went back in the bag. Good work Wenzel!
customer_reviews.author: robert brown

customer_reviews.title: A++++++ Tent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tent for the price. I am in love with the open air concept Would and will buy again from Wenzel
customer_reviews.author: Chip S.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent in Dec. 2015 as a gift for my son and his family. They have used it 2x's, once this past weekend, and one of the tent pole's broke. Called the manufacture on Monday and they no longer make this tent (since 2012) and you can not get replacement poles from them. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent that is great for families! A lot of room and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Lately I have noticed they are not building them that good. This tent has 3 poles and one is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Wenzel before, actually 4 times before. Lately I have noticed they are not building them that good. This tent has 3 poles and one is suppose to be smaller, at least what the directions says, well it is actually longer by an inch than the other two. It works fine but the brand is not as great as it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: love this tent
customer_reviews.text: woohoo! love this tent! works everywhere, mountains, forest... you name it
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Engels

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent, easy to put up and most importantly you can stand up in it if you are tall.
customer_reviews.author: sharon roebuck

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: I have officially taken this tent camping twice now and have decided that it is a great tent for me. It is nice and tall so I can stand up in it and has a lot of ventilation on hot days. I have not tested it in the rain yet but I like how the rain fly goes all the way down. I use it for myself and my toddler. I can comfortably have a queen size bed set up and a portable crib and still have room for play area. It's really easy to set up and take down. I was able to do it myself (and that's with a toddler at my feet).
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice tall ceiling well made tent
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice tall roof, easy to setup and plenty of room for 4 large adults go get one today
customer_reviews.author: FL Boyeee

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: there are six plastic recepticles for the tent poles. five were the correct size , the sixth one was too small, probably meant for another tent. Also, one of the shock cords was broken. Had to return the tent. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Peter Francescani

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent over my Field and Stream model. It's more spacious and better headroom. It would be absolutely perfect if it had a vestibule though. All in all, very good value.
customer_reviews.author: L Abshire

customer_reviews.title: wich is damn nice I'm 6 foot and have a couple of Inchs ...
customer_reviews.text: I can stand up in this tent, wich is damn nice I'm 6 foot and have a couple of Inchs to spare
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tent. Roomy, good quality, easy set up. we are extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Rob m

customer_reviews.title: Sprenkle pa.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent was worth the money has good ventilation &plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Beth a sprenkle

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: It has enough room for a lot of people and it is tall enough for people to stand inside. Also very easy to set it up. Overall I think this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bina D

customer_reviews.title: and I was looking forward to a great product as Wenzel makes great tents
customer_reviews.text: Tent was floppy... and in the wind... if not staked... blew down or away... and I was looking forward to a great product as Wenzel makes great tents....... Bob
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Costigan

product_meta.title: Wenzel Evergreen Tent - 6 Person
product_meta.description: Spacious and weather-resistant, the Wenzel Evergreen family dome tent sleeps up to six campers in its two rooms, making it ideal for mid-size families or couples with lots of gear. Back-to-back D-style doors, three mesh windows, and a mesh roof combine to create a refreshing cross breeze on warm evenings, while shock-corded fiberglass poles with Fast Feet offer quick set up
feature_bullets: Six-person dome tent can be separated into two rooms
Weather Armor polyester fabric with polyurethane coating
Three closable mesh windows & Mesh roof
Shock-corded fiberglass poles with Fast Feet for quick set up
Gear loft; E-port for electrical cords. Pre Attached Guy Ropes Can Be Used For Added Stability

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
